QuestData.Title: Rally the Survivors
QuestData.Description: The people of this village are simple farmers - not fighters like you and I. Still, they are stubbornly defending their homes as best they can.$B$BSearch the village for anyone still on their feet and tell them to rally here at Hanae's place.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with 5 Nectarbreeze Farmers around Nectarbreeze Orchard and send them to the safehouse.
QuestData.RewardText: They're inside. Shaken, but alive thanks to you.
